rooms.name: Open-Plan Living and Kitchen Area
rooms.description: An integrated space combining a living area with an open-plan kitchen. Features include ample natural light through large windows, built-in storage, and contemporary fixtures. The layout promotes social interaction and aligns with Vastu principles by placing the entrance to this area in the east direction.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated media room designed for entertainment purposes. It includes acoustic treatment, comfortable seating arrangements, and ambient lighting. Vastu considerations ensure proper placement to avoid distractions from the main living areas.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A well-lit dining area adjacent to the kitchen. The space is designed for hosting meals and gatherings, with attention paid to natural ventilation and lighting in accordance with local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. The layout considers privacy, ample storage, and a serene environment with Vastu principles ensuring a balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortably sized bedroom designed for additional family members or guests. The design follows local norms by providing sufficient lighting and ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom maintaining symmetry in the floor plan and ensuring natural light and proper airflow as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A compact bedroom option for smaller spaces or flexible usage. Designed to maximize utility while preserving aesthetic appeal.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Additional bedroom to meet the penthouse requirements, designed with minimalistic approach and functional space planning in accordance with local norms.
